name: Exploding Golf, with Lovable Piggies
description:
You like golf, right? Everybody likes golf, shut up. And you like explosions, right? And you like piggies no doubt whatsoever. Therefore you will be thrilled to know that, at this very moment, if you act now, you can experience all three in one gigantic juicy package in the epic new golf-like explosion and pig simulation gaming extravaganza Exploding Golf, with Lovable Piggies.

The Goal: In each level, hit the WHITE ball in order to get the RED ball into the HOLE. Hit the Z button to explode the WHITE ball, should that seem prudent to you in a given circumstance. Oh and don’t kill any pigs.Easy.

Yes, golf is fun, and piggies are adorable, but with all these explosions around the more you have, the worse it is.

Created from scratch in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40. Don’t doubt it.

Made with the glorious pico-8, which you really must try if you’re into this kind of thing. (The Ludum Dare kind of thing).
